agilermi.codemobility

Interface ClassLoaderFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    URLClassLoaderFactory

    public interface ClassLoaderFactory
    This class is used to define a proper class loading strategy for the target platform and to obtain a functional weak code mobility at the RMI protocol level. The actual instances of this interface can be passed to the RMIRegistry.Builder to customize the class loading process when receiving remote objects whose code is not known in the local environment. By default, RMIRegistry uses the URLClassLoaderFactory to download code from remote codebases. Some platform, that implements its own Java Virtual Machine, needs different class loading mechanisms that do more operations than just loading standard jar or class files. These mechanisms can be implemented in a custom ClassLoader whose new instances can be returned by the createClassLoader(URL,ClassLoader) method of this interface.
    Author:
    Salvatore Giampa'

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.ClassLoader createClassLoader(java.net.URL url, java.lang.ClassLoader parent)
      Create a new instance of the ClassLoader implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • createClassLoader

        java.lang.ClassLoader createClassLoader(java.net.URL url,
                                        java.lang.ClassLoader parent)
        Create a new instance of the ClassLoader implementation.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL of the codebase whose code must be loaded
        parent - the parent ClassLoader
        Returns:
        a new ClassLoader instance
